## StateType.serialize() method

Serializes a state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
serialize(deserialized: T, helpers: StoreSerializeHelpers): S;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                                                                       | Description                             |
| ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| deserialized | T                                                                          | state to serialize                      |
| helpers      | [StoreSerializeHelpers](./internal__plugin-state.storeserializehelpers.md) | helpers (e.g. to serialize an document) |

<b>Returns:</b>

S

serialized state
